channel.title: 2021 on SANTI'S MEMEX
channel.description: Recent content in 2021 on SANTI'S MEMEX

item.title: End of 2021: Reflections
item.description: As we head into 2022 (Minus Betty White, RIP) I’m thinking more and more about the movie, Aniara. I’m also moving to Boston in March, and besides all the work involved, I’m still feeling pretty hesitant about putting together a portfolio. Since New Year’s is the traditional, permitted mass inflection point, I might as well take advantage. I want to continue working out in the new year, although I think this holiday experiment in simplifing to a heavy kettlebell has been mostly disaster.
